hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: Boys used to be brought to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and he would invoke blessings on them. Yusuf added: "and soften some dates and rub their palates with them". He did not mention "blessings

grades.name: Zubair Ali Zai
grades.grade: Isnaad Sahih Sahih Bukhari (6355) Sahih Muslim (286)

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الصَّبِيِّ يُولَدُ فَيُؤَذَّنُ فِي أُذُنِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Saying the adhan in the ear of the newborn
